mapper.insert: insert into CC_CALL_LOGS (CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, MOBILE_AREA, CALL_TYPE, SEAT_TYPE, RESULT, DURATION, RECORD_URL, SATISFIC, START_TIME, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_EMAIL, RINGING_DURATION, END_TIME, NOTE_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, TRUNK_NUMBER, CALL_SOURCE, QUERY_TYPE, QUERY_TIME, LEAVE_MESSAGE, DROP_SIDE, IVR_TIME, ORGANIZATION_ID, HAS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL, QUEUE_OVERFLOW, AD_TASK_NAME, IVR_VARIABLES, DEFEAT_CAUSE, OUTLINE_PHONE_NUMBER, MULTI_RING_COUNT, TICKETS) values (#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satisfic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ringingDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trunkNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{callSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{leaveMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dropSide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ivrTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasSubsequentCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queueOverflow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adTaskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ivrVariables,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defeatCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outlinePhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{multiRingCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tickets,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select: select CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, MOBILE_AREA, CALL_TYPE, SEAT_TYPE, RESULT, DURATION, RECORD_URL, SATISFIC, START_TIME, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_EMAIL, RINGING_DURATION, END_TIME, NOTE_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, TRUNK_NUMBER, CALL_SOURCE, QUERY_TYPE, QUERY_TIME, LEAVE_MESSAGE, DROP_SIDE, IVR_TIME, ORGANIZATION_ID, HAS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL, QUEUE_OVERFLOW, AD_TASK_NAME, IVR_VARIABLES, DEFEAT_CAUSE, OUTLINE_PHONE_NUMBER, MULTI_RING_COUNT, TICKETS from CC_CALL_LOGS
